original_text: At that time, many people will turn against the king of the south. Violent men from your own people in Israel will also be ready to attack him. This would make the vision become true. They will fight against him, but they will fail.
korean_text: 그 때에 여러 사람이 일어나서 남방 왕을 칠 것이요 네 백성 중에서도 포악한 자가 스스로 높아져서 환상을 이루려 할 것이나 그들이 도리어 걸려 넘어지리라

sentences.original_text: many people will turn against the king of the south
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 남방 왕을 대적할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Violent men from your own people in Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 네 동족 중 폭력적인 사람들

sentences.original_text: will also be ready to attack him
This would make the vision become true
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 그 환상을 이루게 할 것입니다
